issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Make initializing dag ids in TezWork thread safe for parallel compilation

comments.body: I have attached a patch which replaces int with AtomicInteger.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12798638/HIVE-13512.1.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12800330 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build

The test failure appear not to be related to this patch. Between the two tests run, the patch has not changed. The common test fail between the two runs is TestMiniSparkOnYarnCliDriver.testCliDriver_index_bitmap3. However, this is using TestMiniSparkOnYarnCliDriver which should not be creating TezWork objects, which this patch only touches.
[~gopalv], could you please confirm my above statement regarding the test failures. I would like to know the next steps I need to take for getting this patch in. Thank you!
